mock_answers.description: Contains user-submitted answers to questions on the QA platform. Each answer is linked to a question and a user, and has a timestamp and textual content.

columns.question_id: Foreign key to the associated question (INT64)
columns.user_id: Foreign key to the user who answered (INT64)
columns.created_at: Timestamp when the answer was submitted (TIMESTAMP)
columns.content: Text content of the user's answer (STRING)

mock_questions.description: Stores user-generated questions posted on the platform. Each question is associated with a user and includes a timestamp and content.

columns.user_id: ID of the user who posted the question (INT64)

mock_users.description: User profile information including personal identifiers and basic metadata such as name, email, and date of birth.

mock_user_sessions.description: Tracks user session activity such as session duration and date. Useful for engagement analysis and retention metrics.

columns.session_id: Unique identifier for a user session (STRING)
columns.user_id: ID of the user who had the session (INT64)
columns.duration_min: Length of the session in minutes (FLOAT64)
columns.session_date: Date on which the session occurred (DATE)
